General.Name: Gemdale Corp
General.Description: Gemdale Corporation engages in the real estate development business in China and internationally. It is also involved in the commercial real estate and industrial park town development and operation, real estate finance, intelligent services, sports industry operation, home decoration, agent construction, education, property management, and other businesses. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

9.Name: Mr. Xinhua  Shi
9.Title: Gen. Mang. of Gemdale RE Northeast China
